text: I think knowing that there were so many
coming-of-age films already done very
well and different on their own way and
allowed me a certain shorthand with
certain things certain elements I didn't
have to go into the bowling to such a
degree to for the audience to know that
his life is hell that he's getting
tortured like that's been done well
already and I could just kind of show a
glimpse of it and we we understand what
that experience is going through there's
other moments in there where I could
just take a little bit and say okay well
here's a slice of it because you've seen
other films dealing with this in very
good ways you know that this is a whole
other story on its own I like the idea
of that Terry thinks his life is gonna
be one way and has become very
comfortable with his life being that and
being and he's resigned in that way to
the point where he's just he's relaxed
into it and that something else happens
something unplanned and it changes his
direction may be ever so slightly but
that suddenly he winds up going into a
world and down a direction that he
wasn't expecting and like I liked
exploring that with Terry you know
